# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  exclude rc_ladder_lib.inc rc_simple.cir rc_simple_mor.cir rc_simple_mor.cir.sh rcd_ladder_lib.inc tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rc_simple_mor.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND BASH_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/AUTODETECT/rc_simple_mor.cir.sh COMMAND bash rc_simple_mor.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} rc_simple_mor.cir ${OutputDataDir}/ROM/AUTODETECT/rc_simple_mor.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/AUTODETECT/rc_simple_mor.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/rc_simple_mor.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}ROM/AUTODETECT/rc_simple_mor.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;rom;diode;resistor;capacitor;inductor")
endif()
